
    # **portfolio generator**

    ## **Description:**
    generates a portfolio based on github pojects

    ## **Table of Contents:**
    * [Installation](#Installation)
    * [Usage](#Usage)
    * [License](#License)
    * [Constributions](#Contributions)
    * [Tests](#Tests)
    * [Questions](#Questions)

    ## **Installation:**
    clone from repo

    ## **Usage:**
    open in vs code, type node app in terminal, answer all required questions, generates page
